name: Grinning Face
description: A classic smiling face showing happiness or positivity.

name: Smiling Face with Heart-Eyes
description: Represents love, adoration, or admiration for someone or something.

name: Rolling on the Floor Laughing
description: Used to show hysterical laughter or amusement.

name: Thinking Face
description: Used to express curiosity or deep thought.

name: Crying Face
description: Represents sadness or emotional pain.

name: Face with Tears of Joy
description: Represents laughter, amusement, or something funny.

name: Smiling Face with Sunglasses
description: Represents confidence or coolness.

name: Angry Face
description: Conveys anger, frustration, or displeasure.

name: Zany Face
description: Used for silliness, goofiness, or acting crazy.

name: Smiling Face with Halo
description: Represents innocence, good behavior, or being angelic.

name: Thumbs Up
description: A hand giving approval or encouragement.

name: Folded Hands
description: Represents prayer, gratitude, or a respectful greeting.

name: Clapping Hands
description: Used to show applause, appreciation, or congratulations.

name: Raising Hands
description: Celebration or praise; often used to express joy or excitement.

name: Flexed Biceps
description: Represents strength, power, or confidence.

name: Waving Hand
description: Used for greeting or saying goodbye.

name: Writing Hand
description: Represents writing, journaling, or note-taking.

name: OK Hand
description: Represents approval, agreement, or that everything is fine.

name: Raised Fist
description: Represents solidarity, strength, or empowerment.

name: Handshake
description: Used to represent cooperation or an agreement.

name: Laptop Computer
description: Represents technology, computing, or working remotely.

name: Light Bulb
description: Symbolizes creativity, new ideas, or inspiration.

name: Rocket
description: Symbolizes fast progress, ambition, or space travel.

name: Book
description: Represents learning, knowledge, or storytelling.

name: Camera
description: Represents photography, creativity, or capturing memories.
